metadata.name: Shapella Upgrade #1/133
metadata.description:
Exclusively for *[GraffitETH](https://www.niftygateway.com/marketplace/collection/0x7ba08e9d2b551a06cb3b76e3e76319f7790003ea)* holders.  

The following piece is 3D motion graphics designed, built, and animated in After Effects.  
100% loopable 4K ultra high-definition digital content.  

NFT Specs:  
3840 x 2160  
H.264  
MP4
